title: we are urgently in need of a sales representative in various regions all over the united states
snippet:
we are urgently in need of a sales representative in various regions all over the united states . we seek well talented individual all over the states that are ready to work we provide services to big and small companies all over the state. we currently seeking individual's whom will be in charge of  fund collecting in or outside of his or her regions from our various clients and customer all over united states .we seek  well trusted man and woman and we only want application from serious minded individuals  we are seeking well talented, Educated men and women to work for us from their various regions in the united states.we wont tolerate  any drug related substances user and we wont
employ anyone with dangerous criminal back ground .we screen all our Applicant's before employing them to work for us .
